databases introducing Amazon Aurora
Amazon Aurora is a relational database
engine that's designed to be compatible
with mySQL so your existing applications
can just work Amazon Aurora provides up
to five times the performance of
standard MySQL on the same Hardware
scaling up to millions of transactions
per minute that's a lot if you need more
you can add replicas up to 15 of them
that's an awful lot it'll automatically
grow your storage as needed all the way
up to 64
tabt you don't have to engineer for high
availability because it's built right in
Amazon Aurora replicates your data to
three availability zones it tolerates
failures and fixes the mod automatically
it continuously monitors your databases
and it'll automatically fail over if
needed durable backups are continuous
and automatic too an Amazon Aurora is
simple it's managed by Amazon RDS which
takes care of complicated databased
Administration tasks like provisioning
patching and monitoring so you don't
have to and if you're using Amazon RDS
for my SQL today you can migrate to
Amazon Aurora with just a few clicks all
these highend features are available for
a tenth of what you'd pay for a
commercial database with capabilities
like these no upfront costs no
commitments required pay for what you
use each hour you use it Amazon RDS for
Aurora designed for the speed and
